title: ICE: rustdoc: `panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0` search_index.rs

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
### Code ```Rust fn use_avx() -> dyn { !( ident_error ) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 1.68.0-nightly (92c1937a9 2022-12-27) ``` ### Error output `rustdoc --document-private-items --edition=2021 ` ``` ```
Backtrace
